name: Temporal Trend Risk Rule: activity_trend_3w declining trend
theory_rationale: Aligned with Engagement Theory, the activity feature(s) reflect(s) participation continuity; low engagement signal(s) insufficient participation.
f_logic_rule:
Student(S) [risk -> engagement_risk, confidence -> 0.85] :-
    Student(S) AND activity_trend_3w < 0 consecutive decline >= 1 time AND theory_alignment(S, 'Engagement', 0.2240000069141388).

name: Click Decline Sequence Rule: clicks_forum continuous decline
theory_rationale: Aligned with Student Integration Model, the clicks_forum feature(s) reflect(s) social-academic integration; low engagement signal(s) lack of integration.
f_logic_rule:
Student(S) [risk -> studentintegration_risk, confidence -> 0.85] :-
    Student(S) AND clicks_forum declines in consecutive periods AND theory_alignment(S, 'StudentIntegration', 0.20900000631809235).

name: Click Decline Sequence Rule: total_clicks continuous decline
theory_rationale: Aligned with Engagement Theory, the total_clicks feature(s) reflect(s) participation continuity; low engagement signal(s) insufficient participation.
f_logic_rule:
Student(S) [risk -> engagement_risk, confidence -> 0.85] :-
    Student(S) AND total_clicks declines in consecutive periods AND theory_alignment(S, 'Engagement', 0.1459999978542328).

name: early Phase Risk Rule: activity_density Low Value Period
theory_rationale: Aligned with Engagement Theory, the activity_density feature(s) reflect(s) participation continuity; low engagement signal(s) insufficient participation.
f_logic_rule:
Student(S) [risk -> engagement_risk, confidence -> 0.524] :-
    Student(S) AND week ∈ [0,4] AND activity_density ≤ 0.0 AND theory_alignment(S, 'Engagement', 0.16899999976158142).

name: early Phase Risk Rule: forum_activity Low Value Period
theory_rationale: Aligned with Student Integration Model, the forum_activity feature(s) reflect(s) social-academic integration; low engagement signal(s) lack of integration.
f_logic_rule:
Student(S) [risk -> studentintegration_risk, confidence -> 0.52] :-
    Student(S) AND week ∈ [0,4] AND forum_activity ≤ 0.0 AND theory_alignment(S, 'StudentIntegration', 0.2529999911785126).

name: early Phase Risk Rule: other Low Value Period
theory_rationale: Aligned with Student Integration Model, the other feature(s) reflect(s) social-academic integration; low engagement signal(s) lack of integration.
f_logic_rule:
Student(S) [risk -> studentintegration_risk, confidence -> 0.502] :-
    Student(S) AND week ∈ [0,4] AND other ≤ 12.0 AND theory_alignment(S, 'StudentIntegration', 0.0820000022649765).

name: early Phase Risk Rule: activity_trend_3w Moderate Fluctuation
theory_rationale: Aligned with Engagement Theory, the activity_trend_3w feature(s) reflect(s) participation continuity; low engagement signal(s) insufficient participation.
f_logic_rule:
Student(S) [risk -> engagement_risk, confidence -> 0.474] :-
    Student(S) AND week ∈ [0,4] AND -0.0 ≤ activity_trend_3w ≤ 0.0 AND theory_alignment(S, 'Engagement', 0.1889999955892563).

name: early Phase Risk Rule: activity_consistency Low Value Period
theory_rationale: Aligned with Engagement Theory, the activity_consistency feature(s) reflect(s) participation continuity; low engagement signal(s) insufficient participation.
f_logic_rule:
Student(S) [risk -> engagement_risk, confidence -> 0.468] :-

name: early Phase Risk Rule: avg_score Low Value Period
theory_rationale: Aligned with Self-Efficacy Theory, the avg_score feature(s) reflect(s) task competence; low engagement indicate(s) low self-efficacy.
f_logic_rule:
Student(S) [risk -> selfefficacy_risk, confidence -> 0.441] :-
    Student(S) AND week ∈ [0,4] AND avg_score ≤ 0.0 AND theory_alignment(S, 'SelfEfficacy', 0.17299999296665192).

theory_rationale: Aligned with Engagement Theory, the clicks_content feature(s) reflect(s) participation continuity; low engagement signal(s) insufficient participation.

name: Single Feature Risk Rule: total_clicks_cat=VL
theory_rationale: Aligned with Engagement Theory, the total_clicks feature(s) reflect(s) participation continuity; low engagement signal(s) insufficient participation.
f_logic_rule:
Student(S) [risk -> engagement_risk, confidence -> 0.312] :-
    Student(S) AND total_clicks_cat == 'VL' AND theory_alignment(S, 'Engagement', 0.1459999978542328).
